name: infrastructure-automation
description: Complete infrastructure automation suite for S3 backups, CI/CD, and CDN integration

scripts.deploy:backup: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file s3-backup-cloudformation.yaml --stack-name s3-backup-infrastructure --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy:pipeline: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file codepipeline-config.yaml --stack-name codepipeline-infrastructure --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.update:lambda: zip s3-backup-lambda.zip s3-backup-lambda.js && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name s3-backup-automation --zip-file fileb://s3-backup-lambda.zip
scripts.test:backup: aws lambda invoke --function-name s3-backup-automation --payload '{}' response.json && cat response.json
scripts.validate: aws cloudformation validate-template --template-body file://s3-backup-cloudformation.yaml && aws cloudformation validate-template --template-body file://codepipeline-config.yaml
scripts.cleanup: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name codepipeline-infrastructure && aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name s3-backup-infrastructure
